Reviews.Title: An Amazing Purchase
Reviews.Author: Megan Leigh "Megan"
Reviews.Content: I've owned a Kodak camera for five years now and it was time to replace it. For Christmas I had purchased a Nikon Coolpix s203 thinking that I needed a change. Long story short, I took the camera back to Target and exchanged it for this one. Everything about this camera is spectacular. Regardless if you're an experinced photographer or brand new this camera is for you. Gone are the days of changing the settings, this camera does it automatically for you. Of course if you want to do it yourself you still have that option. The image quality on the camera's screen is very clear, and the photos come out amazingly too. I haven't had a change to mess with the video on the camera yet but from what the box says it makes it easy to put on Youtube. It's very easy to use and I love everything about this camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Content: I am a photographer at heart, and I got my first camera when I was about 5 or so. This is my third camera. I got a Flip camera for Christmas but replaced it with this one. I love it! It is so skinny and small... and it was so cheap too! I had enough money left to buy a case, and then a little more! It is really easy to work. In my old camera, you used to have to take out the batteries and charge them for like a day and a half, but I love how you can just plug this one into the wall. It is really easy to work... I don't have any difficulties. Overall a realy great product!

Reviews.Title: Bought this as a mothers day present
Reviews.Author: HM
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom for mothers day and she has used it constantly since then. she loves it and with her not being so tech savy, im glad its easy enough for her to understand. and it still takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Camera is Amazing!
Reviews.Author: quirkygrrl "Liza B"
Reviews.Content: I got a great deal on this camera, however, it is of amazing quality! I absolutely love the fact that the camera can detect the type of picture it's going to be when you focus the picture. For example, before I take the picture it automatically says that the picture is a portrait, landscape, etc. So, even if you are an idiot you can still take good pictures. I really recommend this camera. Kodak never fails to impress me.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Brandi Nicole Gray
Reviews.Content: This camera exceeded my expectations.  The clarity of the screen is unbelievable and navigation is so easy.  I forgot that this was an easy share camera, but this feature is so helpful when it comes to uploading my pictures.  Love everything about it!!

Reviews.Title: Good product , easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Cherylj
Reviews.Content: Good product , easy to use.  Cons: difficult to figure out how to copy to my computer but worked well when I figured it out.  Cheryl

Reviews.Title: ok for nimble fingers with good eyesight
Reviews.Author: Hilltop Mama
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband but didn't realize how small the different buttons are to push; he has poor eyesight and large fingers - not very easy for him at all! He was also bothered with lack of viewfinder. We took some pictures with the camera and they came out "ok" - color didn't seem as true as with my larger Canon.Camera was accidentally dropped two weeks ago and back LED screen shattered.  Won't replace it with the same model.

Reviews.Title: With a name like Kodak, how can you go wrong ?
Reviews.Author: Thomas P. Cody
Reviews.Content: The Kodak EasyShare camera that I purchased on Amazon was a perfect fit for me. Great pictures, great price, and easy to use. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Husband loves it!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Beasley
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husbands birthday and he loves it.  It takes good videos and pictures.  Easly to figure camera out.

Reviews.Title: Simple point and shoot works well
Reviews.Author: J. Yeager
Reviews.Content: My needs are simple: point-and-shoot, a few zoom options, the ability to play around with settings, a few preset options (closeup, night shot, portrait, red eye reduction), high resolution, and not too expensive.  This camera fit all of my needs just fine.  It's intuitive to use and relatively customizable.  My only complaint is that it doesn't come with a memory card, and the internal memory only has enough room for about ten high resolution photos. Otherwise this is a great little camera that takes amazing pictures, decent video, and is easy to work with.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed, product only worked for three months
Reviews.Author: Boudica's Sword
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in May for casual family photography. I have only used it on five different occasions to film my daughter riding her horse and one vacation trip. Now, even after replacing the battery twice and charging it overnight many times, the lenses refuses to stay extended The charger light indicates the camera is fully charged but the lense will not operate. I am very disappointed with this product. Unfortunately, my return-option period ended in June so now I am looking for a new camera. It will not be this brand. If I could give it 1/2 star I would. I am definitely telling all my family and friends NOT to buy this product.

Reviews.Title: No so good
Reviews.Author: Brett Johnson
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my girlfriend as part of her birthday present.  She seems happy with it and it does take a really nice picture considering how little I spent on it.Update: After owning this camera for a very short time the camera crapped out on us.  I'll be contacting amazon and the manufacturer to see if we can get it repaired or replaced.

Reviews.Title: Great Mom Gift
Reviews.Author: brookerains
Reviews.Content: I got a great price for this on Amazon and gave it to my mom for Mother's Day. She is not good with technology and wanted something that was easy to figure out, simple to use in program mode, and takes good pictures. That's it. This actually does more than she needs. She loves it. The pictures look great, although we haven't printed any. For this type of camera, I think it is a great product.

Reviews.Title: Worked for 3 months.
Reviews.Author: M. Smith
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Kodak Easyshare MD41 camera in late June 2010.  By late September of the same year, the camera would not cut on but only for a second.  The lens would come out and immediately go back in and the camera would shut off.  Obviously, I could no longer use the camera due to the hardware malfunction.  The battery was fine and the computer still recognized the camera.  Wouldn't recommend this one.

Reviews.Author: del0003
Reviews.Content: I got this as a replacement for my last Kodak point and shoot, and I love it! I am a photography student and I use film cameras, but of course I need a regular digital camera. The quality is great and the features are simple yet effective for every day use. I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone thinking of buying an everyday digital camera. I have always loved Kodak cameras and I wont buy any other kind when it comes to a simple digital camera.

Reviews.Title: nice lil camera...I guess
Reviews.Author: greeneyez508
Reviews.Content: Nice slim sleek design...picture quality could be better,and dont like that it doesnt down load photos in the order that you took them,they get downloaded in a mixed fashion,which makes it difficult to find all views of 1 item...battery needs to be charged often too...It will do for now,but will be looking again.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Mar "Marinera"
Reviews.Content: this is average picture quality.lots of blurry pictures and not so sharp like other kodaks.not impressed

Reviews.Title: Kodak camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kodak digital camera & I am very pleased with it...the pictures are beautiful .....the camera is ssooo easy to use....my husband said we should get another one because the price was so good..we are very satified with this camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Worth to buy for small price
Reviews.Author: conantee
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera. It's not expensive but powerful. The only thing weird (I'm not sure if it happened only to me or not) is buzzing sound when the camera is set into some modes, but it doesn't affect the joy of taking photos.

Reviews.Title: Flawless camera
Reviews.Author: R. Weddle "gamerrecuit"
Reviews.Content: This by far is the best digital camera I've owned. The many features are perfect for any shot.

Reviews.Title: Shipped Fast
Reviews.Author: Steven Heinrich
Reviews.Content: Perfect price for a little point and shoot. I bought this for my mom (not a tech savvy lady). It is easy enough for her, it should be simple for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Keri
Reviews.Content: It worked perfect for what we bought it for ...pics of my baby niece's milestones :) love it  Great camera

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: bffwct
Reviews.Content: Great buy! Definitely worth the money. Even though it's refurbished, it is in great condition and workslike new. Recommended to all!

Reviews.Title: Just perfect says my wife; I am not excited about it
Reviews.Author: J. Moyer
Reviews.Content: Good looking; quality item.  My wife likes the ease and the photos.  I think there's too many settings for many different lighting conditions, and I like photos better from my own camera.

Reviews.Title: Did Not Work Upon Arrival
Reviews.Author: ASH
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my father.  He was pretty excited when it arrived in the mail, because he was planning on taking pictures at a family function.  While at the event, my father turned the camera on to take a group picture when suddenly, smoke started rising from the camera, and it shut off.  I had to return the camera for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Great quality...then craps out
Reviews.Author: Danielle Yingling
Reviews.Content: When I got this camera, I loved it.  The quality is like no other in its price range.  Great for everyday picture taking. Only problem I had was it wouldn't charge right.  The charger that came with it didn't seem to fit correctly.  Then, one day, it just wouldn't go in.  I wiggled it in finally and f---ed something up because after that, it wouldn't charge.  My advice is if the charger doesn't work RETURN IT IMMEDIATELY. Save your receipt, etc.  I may have just had a lemon.  As long as you don't have this problem, the camera is amazing!

Reviews.Title: LOVE this camera!
Reviews.Author: Natasha C. Rodenberg
Reviews.Content: I purchase this camera last summer. Oh my goodness, I LOVE it. It is easy to use and very light weight. I have had the product for a year now with NO problems. There is even a "smart" picture function that takes the perfect picture every time. Years ago I purchased a digital camera for $500. It was big and tended to take 4 pictures and then it needed another 6 batteries. I hated it and swore off digital cameras. This little guy even comes with a power cord to charge it, so there are never those problems with battery mongers again. I am so glad I bit the bullet and tried it!

Reviews.Title: horrible!!
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: First off, this is the second camera through Amazon that I have had to return due to faulty equipment.  On this one specifically, the camera was shipped and it was not new (contrary to what i had thought, it has some front scratches, etc.)  Secondly, and most importantly, the camera wouldn't even turn on, even after charging it for hours!  It is clearly defective, and a huge disappointment.  I do not recommend this to anyone, unless you like being let down!!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Jossie
Reviews.Content: I love my camera. I can't remember when I love it but I love it. I have absolutely no complains about it!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: G. Fara "babaman2"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for almost a year and would strongly recommend AGAINST purchasing it. It is very cheaply made. The buttons along the screen do not work anymore and it recently stopped taking pictures correctly. Now everything comes out purple and very blurry.

Reviews.Title: Did I get a lemon?
Reviews.Author: kam2010
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in October, (2010)and it has turned out to be probably the worse camera I've had.  The only way my pictures turn out at all is if I keep it on the blur reduction feature  - and even then they're not always so great.  I'm not talking just about moving objects or people.  I'm talking about taking a still shot while standing perfectly still.  I'm not a shaky person so I don't think it's just me. It also doesn't do well in anything but good, bright lighting.  It worked fine for the first month but now it's just terrible.I like the smallness of it and the large viewing screen but that doesn't help at all with the quality of my pictures.The other reviewers really seem to like theirs so this leaves me to wonder if I just got a lemon.

Reviews.Title: At last - a camera I can use
Reviews.Author: Internet grandma
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my own birthday present last summer at the beginning of a long vacation, and my husband and I both love it. So, now it's ours!  It shoots stills and movies and is easy to focus. And it fits in your pocket. We have three other digital cameras including a Panasonic with a better lens, but for snapshots this is great. It does require a card reader capable of the high density cars. My husband bought an 8G card so he could take a lot of movies of steam trains during a recent trip.  I don't recommend it, though, because I messed up my card reader trying to get it to work. My laptop took the card easily, so it can be done.I didn't try any of the EasyShare functions because I'm not interested in them.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed to say the least...
Reviews.Author: DDD30318
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a replacement to my previous two Kodak Easy Shares (both of which lasted more than 2 years apiece and withstood a ton of wear and tear).  I had the camera for 2.5 months and it stopped working on the day of my only son's first birthday party.  Awesome.  I replaced the battery and went to two different camera stores who told me to contact the seller as the camera was defective.  The camera hadn't been dropped or exposed to water, it didn't have a scratch on it and it was barely used.I contacted the seller to see if he/she would replace the camera or at least offer me a discounted replacement since I had it for a matter of a handful of weeks.  No dice.  I got a one sentence reply telling me to contact Kodak.  So much for customer service.  I bought a replacement today from Costco...please learn from my disappointing experience and purchase electronic goods from a store or vendor who will replace defective electronics and values repeat customers.  I'll never spend money with this vendor again.

Reviews.Title: Love my Camera!
Reviews.Author: mercedesjay
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! Great pictures, easy to use, great size! Love it all the way!

Reviews.Title: Totally disappointment!!
Reviews.Author: R. Montes
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera on August 10 and it worked well firstdays. Two days ago I turned it on to take some pictures of mydaughter and could not turn it off.  The only way to turn it off wasremoving the battery.Today I try to turn on again and there was no lights at all... not evenmaking noises, it's totally dead!!!I'm totally disappointment.  I filed a claim at Amazon but they request to send it back and that cost me $75 dollars back and forth...I rather pay the freight instead of buy a good one because one it break down never come good again...

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: The price was great, shipping fast, and product is just what I wanted. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Poorly made
Reviews.Author: Kimberly A. Breukink
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Kodak Easy Share after losing my Olympus digital camera that I've had for four years.  The first camera broke after one week of use.  It would turn on and then promptly turn off.  Returned to Office Max and got a new Kodak Easy Share and this camera did the same thing after the first use.  Not sure why the cameras kept breaking, but it ruined photo opportunties for two vacations.  I will not buy another Kodak.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I'm an amatuer photograper and I had been looking for a inexpensive pocket camera.But after my terrible experience with the Kodak Z1012 I swore I'd never buy another Kodak.However, a friend showed me photos taken at a local club with the Kodak EasyShare MD41 and I was impressed!I bought one the next day---It's a nice little on the go camera.It's small,compact and fits nicely in a shirt pocket.The video isn't that great, but then again, it's not a video camera.All in All, I give it 4 out of 5 Stars.

Reviews.Title: Working as expected
Reviews.Author: Osimo
Reviews.Content: The only reason why i'm giving a 4 and not a 5 is because i've been using this camera for less than 2 months (and endurance is something I value very much) still is a good product that has preformed as intended, and perhaps thats what makes this a great product, I havent had an issue of any kind no memory problems, no driver problems, it has all worked out as it should on the first try, and thats not something i get often.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare MD41
Reviews.Author: jecblack
Reviews.Content: Response to request/order was timely.  Product arrived in excellent condition.  Seller's price was reasonable.  I would recommend the seller to family and friends.  Very pleased with product.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Hannah M. Katongan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 17 yr old son on his birthday. This camera worked after charging it once, it wouldn't take a charge any more. I called amazon and they told me it was too late to return it. Has anyone else had this problem? My son missed a lot of photo opportunities at his summer camp. I'm not sure if a replacement battery is available or not. Before I knew it my girlfriend wanted one for mothers day and I got her one. It never would charge up. I got to return that one but I'm upset about the first one. It wasn't our fault that my son took it out of town to summer camp when the return window slammed shut. Amazon you should be ashamed.

ProductInfo.Features:
12-megapixel resolution
3x optical zoom
Smart Capture feature automatically identifies the scene and adjusts camera settings
2.7-inch LCD screen
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare MD41 12 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Black)
